pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
Get involved, make a difference 

Give an hour. Give a Saturday. Give your best.

Everyone has special skills and talents they can share to make a difference in our community.Through Contoso Give, there are hundreds of volunteer opportunities every day. Take part in strengthening our community by helping children with schoolwork, assisting at a local hospital, delivering meals to homebound seniors, or other volunteer services. 

Give the gift of you. Sign up to volunteer today.

Contoso partners with local schools.

Local school districts are looking for volunteers to mentor students interested in world travel. If you have a passion to help others, this is the opportunity for you. 

Giving back to the community is one of our core values. Getting started is easy. Learn more at our upcoming program meetings, or schedule a lunch with one of our program experts to see just how you can help.

On September 18th, the state of Washington added a few clauses to the laws regarding where drones can be used. As a company, it is important for us to stay updated on the current laws so that we do not accidentally misinform our customers and become legally responsible for any actions that they might take.

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: Miriam Graham, Contoso's new Chief Marketing Officer

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
We’re proud to welcome Miriam Graham, who is joining Contoso Electronics as Chief Marketing Officer.

In this role, Miriam will lead a consolidated organization that focuses on advertising, campaigns, communications, and research. This organization, which brings together team members from the former Contoso Customer Research team and the former Contoso Advertising group, is ideally positioned for deep customer learning and resulting product strategies that lead to increased brand recognition, growth and market share across Contoso businesses.   

Miriam brings a wealth of experience to this role. Most recently she served as International Marketing Director for Northwind Traders, where for seven years she oversaw global advertising and campaigns. Prior to that, she led the advertising division at Lucerne Publishing where she was the key contact for marketing strategies across internal organizations and external partners.  Throughout her career, she has amassed experience in sales, media planning, business development, and customer support. She has a solid reputation as a leader who is innovative, skilled, collaborative, and passionate. Additionally, she has advanced degrees in a Mass Communications and in Business. 

Miriam will begin her new role on May 21, in the meantime, here are a few words from her:

❝
I’m thrilled to be joining Contoso Electronics. I’ve long been a fan and an early adopter of the latest technologies, and nothing could be better than joining a company that is on the cutting edge of innovation in this area. I see so much great talent here, and my focus will be on harnessing the experience, ideas, and skills of everyone in the organization to advance Contoso Electronics as THE industry leader. When I’m not at work, I enjoy hiking with my dog, boating, and volunteering on the board of directors for the School of Fine Art.

MIRIAM GRAHAM
Meet the new Contoso Sales & Marketing team

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
Building the workspace of the future

A major renovation of Contoso's Singapore headquarters, along with workspace modernization projects around the globe, will help employees collaborate and create


A community plaza where employees can gather, learn, and play. Car-free zones and a cross-campus bridge just for pedestrians and bicyclists. Energy-optimized smart buildings; spaces to spark creativity with teammates; trees, trails, and transit close at hand.

Our first major redevelopment is nearing completion at the Contoso headquarters in Singapore, and it will rocket forward a modern vision of workspace to lift off across the campus and the globe.

The technology-fueled, multiphase project will empower employee collaboration and community connections, add 18 new buildings, upgrade existing workspaces, and enhance sustainability.

❝

We are building the kind of space we need for the future. We’re building for the employees who are here now, and for the eighth graders who will be here one day. In the past, the employee had to flex to the space. Now, the space flexes to the employee. 

Diego Siciliani, GM of Global Real Estate and Facilities

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
Building a modern campus

Contoso is on a journey, modernizing workplaces across all regions where we do business. We’re making this investment for our employees to provide an exceptional place to work and create greater collaboration and community. We are transforming the way we work, create and innovate.

Information on other global projects coming soon.

We are pleased to announce that construction on the new facility in Singapore is near completion, and is on track for the target opening in fall. This is an exciting time in the history of Contoso Electronics. Our growth over the last five years has been phenomenal, and the new space will help us unlock even greater global potential. 

The opening of this location will allow us to respond effectively to the growth and needs of our existing customers, as well as new customers who are ready to take advantage of all of the products and services we offer.

Designed to enhance customer interactions, teamwork, learning and creativity, the building contains 88 offices, 3 large lounge/collaboration spaces, 5 open design spaces, executive conference rooms, rooftop demo areas, and a trio of client experience areas where teams can meet with their customers for planning, interviews, and user research.  

The building will house our existing staff in Singapore, as well as an additional 45 employees from sales and design disciplines who will be moving from our U.S. headquarters.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
Contoso accessibility and sustainability efforts

Protecting and conserving local habitats, reducing carbon, and eliminating waste in the Contoso Electronics global modernization project.

• Aligned with our long-standing commitment to accessibility, we will continue our focus on inclusive design and accessible technology to empower all our employees.
  • As we work through the design process for each campus, we will embody our corporate sustainability mission in our environment. We will continue to place emphasis on resource management and preservation while driving innovation in the areas of energy, carbon, water, ecosystems and circular economy.
  • The new buildings will be Energy-Smart Buildings that use Azure for building system monitoring and optimization of energy usage.
  • As a Zero Waste Certified campus, we will continue to focus on further waste reduction initiatives.
  • Contoso worked with regulators on a new plan that will allow Contoso Electronics to directly purchase clean energy to power our Singapore headquarters - the first step in our global effort. Once the transition is complete, the vast majority of our campuses will be powered by carbon-free fuels. This is good for Contoso as well as for the environment.
  • Approximately 2,500 new jobs in construction and development will be generated over the 5 to 7 years of the project.
  • Modernized workspaces will support collaboration and productivity through new construction and renovations.

Recently, Marketing Director Miriam Graham and members of her team visited the new building site and came back impressed and ready to take advantage of the opportunities the new location offers.

“It is an amazing space that will serve as a hub for our global community, and we are excited for the potential it brings.”

MIRIAM GRAHAM

Singapore itself has emerged as a global powerhouse over the past decades, with the presence of major international companies growing every day. Singapore matches our own innovative spirit, integrity, and passion for growth. We cannot be more excited for the upcoming opening.  

Final preparations, including move schedules, logistics, and opening day festivities are in the works, and will be announced shortly.

Successful product growth and engagement is fundamentally linked to whether customers understand and realize the value it offers. While all product teams aspire to create an elegant user experience and functionality that enables customers to intuitively “get it” after they try it, product marketers are focused on conveying the product’s value to the customer to engage, convert and retain them. Product marketers play a key role in driving awareness and trial as well as packaging the product to appeal to customers. They accomplish this by packaging a product’s features and functionality into messaging and positioning, pricing, and collateral.
Congratulations Contoso team! This September we set a new annual sales record.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: As enrollment season begins, we wanted to inform you of the changes on this year's choices. From new dental plans to more flexibility with your health savings account.
Contoso encourages our employees to come to us with any issue they might have. We want them to feel comfortable talking with upper management and know that they’re being heard.

We have distributed the updated medical packages pamphlet and we realize all these changes will raise some questions. Make an appointment with your HR representative today to help navigate all the new medical benefits packages and changes from earlier years.
